text.value: What is the marital status of deceased
What is the highest level of education attained by the deceased
What was the occupation of the deceased
Specify the occupation of the deceased
Relationship of respondent to the deceased
Specify the relationship of respondent to the deceased
Highest level of education by Respondent
How many days was s/he ill before s/he died
How many weeks was s/he ill before s/he died
How many years was s/he ill before she died
On the way to a facility
Could you tell me about the illness that led to the baby's death
Summary of signs and symptoms reported by respondent
Do you know the cause(s) of his/her death
Did the deceased suffer from Hypertension
Did the deceased suffer from Other heart diseases
Did the deceased suffer from Diabetes
Did the deceased suffer from Epilepsy
Did the deceased suffer from TB
Did the deceased suffer from HIV/AIDS
Did the deceased suffer from Leprosy
Did the deceased suffer from Asthma
Did the deceased suffer from Cancer
Did the deceased suffer from any other illnesses
Did s/he die from an injury or accident
What kind of injury or accident
Was the injury accidental or intentional
Did s/he die at the site where the accident or injury occurred
How long did s/he survive before s/he died
Did s/he receive medical care from the accident before death
Did s/he have an ongoing chronic illness or was sick in the month before the accident or injury
Do you think that s/he committed suicide
Leading Questions to Elicit Signs and Symptoms of Final Illness
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have fever
How many days did s/he have fever
Was the fever continuous or on and off
During the illness that led to death, did s/he have rash
Did s/he have a rash on the face
Did s/he have a rash on the trunk
Did s/he have a rash on the extremities
Did s/he have a rash all over their body
What other places did s/he have a rash
How many days did s/he have a rash
Did the skin crack/split or peel after the rash started
What did the rash look like
Specify what the rash looked like
Did s/he have itching of skin
Did s/he have bleeding from the body openings
Did s/he have pins and needles in feet
Has s/he lost weight recently before death
How long before death did s/he lose weight
How did s/he look at the end of his/her life
Did s/he have yellow discoloration of the eye
Did s/he have an ulcer on any part of the body
Did s/he have swelling around the ankle
How many days did s/he have the swelling
Did s/he have puffiness of the face
How many days did s/he have the swelling
Did s/he have swelling in the neck
How many days did s/he have the swelling
Did s/he have swelling in the armpit
How many days did s/he have the swelling
Did s/he have swelling in the groin
How many days did s/he have the swelling
Did s/he have swelling of the joints
How many days did s/he have the swelling
How many days did s/he have the cough
Did s/he have shortness of breath
How many days did s/he have breathlessness
Was the pain over the sternum
Was the pain over the heart/in the left arm
Was the pain in the ribs
Was there any pain in a different area of the body
When in activity, was the pain
When s/he had an attack of severe pain, how long did it last
How many days did s/he have diarrhoea
Was was the consistency of stools
When the diarrhoea was severe, how many times did s/he pass a stool in a day
Did s/he pass blood in the stool
How many days did s/he have vomiting
When the vomiting was severe, how many times did s/he vomit in a day
What did the vomit look like
Specify what the vomit looked like
What type of pain was it
Please specify the abdomal pain type
How many days did s/he have the pain
What was the severity of the pain
Was s/he unable to pass a stool for some days before death
How many days did s/he have abdominal distention
Did s/he distention develop rapidly within days or slowly over weeks
Did s/he have difficulty/pain in swallowing
How many days did s/he have difficulty in swallowing
Did s/he have mass in the abdomen
Was the mass located in the right upper abdomen
Was the mass located in the left upper abdomen
Was the mass located in the lower abdomen
What other place was the mass located
How many days did s/he have the mass
How many days did s/he have neck pain
Did s/he experience any change in level of consciousness
Was was the level of his/her consciousness
Specify the level of his/her consciousness
If confused or unconscious, for how many days
How many days did s/he have fits
When fits were most frequent, how many did s/he have per day
Did s/he have difficulty in opening the mouth during fits
Did s/he have stiffness of the whole body during fits
How many days did s/he have stiffness
Did s/he have paralysis of one side of the body
How long did the paralysis take to develop
How many days did s/he have paralysis
Did s/he have paralysis of the lower limbs
How many days did s/he have paralysis
Was there any change in the color of urine
Was was the color of urine
How many days did s/he have the change in urine
Was there any change in the amount of urine s/he passed daily
How much urine did s/he pass in a day
How many days did s/he have the change in amount of urine
Did s/he have difficulty passing urine
How difficult was it for s/he to pass urine
Specify how difficult it was for s/he to pass urine
Did s/he have any operations before death
How many days before death did s/he have the operation
Where was the site of operation
Was she pregnant at the time of death
How many months was she pregnant
Did she deliver within 42 days (6 weeks) before death
How many days before her death did she deliver
Did she have high fever during the pregnancy or after delivery (within days/weeks before death)
On the way to hospital or health facility
How long was she in labour
Did she have difficulty delivering placenta
Did she have too much bleeding before the baby was delivered
Did she have too much bleeding after the baby was delivered
What was the mode of delivery
Did she have an abortion/miscarriage before her death
How many days before her death did she have the abortion
Did she have heavy bleeding after the abortion
Did she have high fever after the abortion
Did she have any previous complicated delivery
Did she have seizures shortly before she died
Did she have any swelling or ulcer in the breast
Did s/he receive any drug during the illness
Did s/he receive any antibiotics during the illness
Did s/he have any anti-malaria drug during the illness
Which anti-malaria drug did s/he receive
Specify the anti-malaria drug s/he received
How long had s/he been drinking alcohol
How often did s/he drink alcohol
How often did s/he get drunk
Did s/he consume traditional illicit brews
What other alcohol did s/he consume
How long has s/he been smoking
How much tobacco did s/he smoke each day
Did s/he consume any other types of tobacco
How long had s/he been using drugs
How often did s/he get high
Specify the prescription drug s/he consumed
Which other drugs did s/he consume

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Permanent Id is not the right format
House Id is not the right format
Field Worker Id is not the right format
The date of the interview cannot be in the future
The age of deceased must be between 12 and 100
Child date of birth must be before the interview date
Date must be before the interview date
Date must be before the interview date
Date must be before the interview date
